"Give me Half Life 3, or give me death"
- Everyone

A very engaging storyline (where you can actually tell what's going on most of the time!) with a gritty, realistic atmosphere in environments, gameplay, and story. Its chaotic, mysterious universe has an underlying tone of hope in the midst of despair and tedium, which the game portrays very well. Recommended for any sort of FPS player looking for a more interesting story than generic Call of Duty nonsense. 

I also recommend Episodes One and Two, though whether the cliffhanger in Episode 2 will ever be resolved remains to be seen...

I grew up on Valve shooters. Counter-Strike, Day of Defeat, Half Life 2. Playing this again brings back so many memories. While the multiplayer games have *not* aged well, the Half Life series of games remains a solid gaming experience.

The puzzles feel fresh even though the mechanics have now existed for a long time in gaming. Perhaps the best part of the game is the story though. The story helps you to make sense of the chaos around you in the game and appreciate the slow moments where Gordon Freeman, the MIT graduate and physist-extraordinaire gets to do what he does best, solve physics based puzzles.

A nice mental stretch from the dull monotony of the typical roided-beefcake of an action hero, Gordon and his story here in Half-Life remain sincere even after more than a decade. When you make a game like this, you can be sure it will last and remain a stalwart example of why video games can convey such amazing stories and lessons.

"Half-Life 2 is, simply put, the best single-player shooter ever released for the PC. It does so many things right in so many ways that it might be possible to write a thesis on the topic of Half-Life 2 compared to other single player shooters. What Valve has created is simply a masterpiece -- a work of art in the genre"   IGN 2004

One of the greatest stories ever told. Hands down.

Even if you only tolerate FPSs do yourself a favor and give it a try. There's a reason a whole generation of gamers fell in love with Half-Life, and eagerly await Half-Life 3.

Let me start this review by saying thank you to Fake Factory’s creator Juergen Vierheilig for remaking Half Life 2. He's Cinematic mod is simply outstanding! The game we all love and adore has been converted in to a true masterpiece! 

When I first installed this mod (it's huge, 90 GB and counting) I couldn’t believe it was actually in Half Life universe, since everything has been changed for the better; the environments, the people, the combat and more.

I have taken many screenshots - check them out too see Half-Life 2 in all its glory!

If you think of playing or replaying this game, I highly recommend you do with this modification installed to experience the game in the way we all dreamed about!

Gra świetna, bardzo fajna fizyka i genialna fabuła, zagrywałem się w tę gre z oczami wlepionymi w monitor <3. Mimo iż grę ukończyłem w 15 godzin to mordowanie kombinatu kuszą na grzane pręty wspominam z uśmiechem cały czas. Grafika jest w porządku co prawda karty graficznej nie pali ale mimo starzenia sią nadal robi dobre wrażenie. Model Strzelania jest spoko choć nie ma tu typowego dla nowych strzelanek strzelania ze sczerbinki mimo wszystko strzela się fajnie, w szególności gdy możemy przybić oponenta kuszą do ściany, miód :3. Genialny Klimat i bohater który mimo iż wycieli mu struny głosowe pozwala się ze sobą zżyć. Grę polecam :D

"Rise and shine, Mister Freeman. Rise and... shine. Not that I... wish to imply you have been sleeping on the job. No one is more deserving of a rest, and all the effort in the world would have gone to waste until... well, let's just say your hour has... come again."

Half-Life 1 was a meaningful, fun, deep, engaging, (if not a little bit corny) Sci-fi, puzzle, FPS, classic, atmospheric adventure. Half-Life 2 takes everything Half-Life 1 did, fixes all the problems, and makes all the things we loved about it about 10 times better.

Brillaint voice acting, exciting music, graphics that still look good after 11 YEARS, masterful story telling, memorable, fun, incredible gameplay, amazing physics, excellent level design, wonderful variety in gameplay, moving, atmospheric... 
You want me to go on? Because I totally could. Half-Life 2 is THE BEST GAME EVER MADE! If you don't think so, play it and understand why it is and why everyone needs a Half-Life 3.

One of VALVe's finest games, Half-Life 2 is definitely a great game. It has awesome gameplay mechanics, and an interesting storyline. For $10, you really get a great game. Of course, remember that the fact that Half-Life 3 MIGHT not come out will make you sad when you finish this game and it's episodes. Besides, that, great game, so pick it up.

The second installment of the flagship series of games from Valve. 
Man. This blew me away. The story is awesome, but if your playing this before playing the first, (Which I did. Too bad the first was spoiled for me. I took that as a go ahead to play this, however, still gonna try to beat it.) good luck trying to understand stuff (duh). The gameplay is really fun, a mix of tense firefights and puzzles that make you think for yourself. At times the solution is obvious, but otherwise, the game doesn't babysit you. It's refreshing. The game has a great physics engine, and physics are a very important aspect of gameplay. Basically, this game is great all around. All aspects of it are perfect.  A must for anyone who owns a PC.

I highly recommend this game if you don't already have it.  Seriously.  This game is different from other games.  It just felt right when I played this.  

Ok so I have over 100 games in my Steam library and I play like a third to a forth of all of them.  I've played the campaigns of Tomb Raider, Saints Row, Far Cry 3, GTA V, Call of Duty, Battlefield, Skyrim, Fallout, Mirrors Edge and Borderlands and yet, I haven't beaten a single one yet, some of them i've had for years.  This game tho and any other Valve game is different.  I've beaten, Portal, Portal 2, Half Life 2 and The Stanley Parable.  You know what they all have in common? They all run on the Source Engine.  Seriously it's one of the best game engines out there, my freaking laptop can play any Source game at 60FPS and my laptop is TERRIBLE. 

So back to Half life.  This game just felt right, it got me hooked so to say, at least this time around.  I've tried to play it years before and I always got lost or bored, this time around I couldn't stop, I really couldn't.  I would go through school the next day just wanting to come home and play this game. It's just seriously a masterpeice and thats all I can really say.  Just please, if oyu haven't already, don't hesitate to buy this.

Half-Life 2 Cinematic Mod 2013

bünyede black mesa source etkisi bırakmasa da yine efsanevi bir iş çıkarılan half-life modu. karakter modellemeleri ve kaplamalar konusunda gerçekten iyi iş çıkarılmış. özellikle cinematic mod zorluk seviyesi ile birlikte cinematic mod silah seçeneği aynı anda kullanıldığında oyun bir hayli zorlaşıyor. otomatik nişangah olmadan, iron sigh ile otların arasında headcrab avlamak bir hayli zor.

oyunun en önemli eksilerinden biri kurulumunun bir hayli sıkıntılı olması. benim kullandığım cinematic mod 2013 versiyonu hl2, hl2 ep1, hl2 ep2 olmak üzere üç oyunun da kurulu olmasını gerekli kılıyor. aynı zamanda source sdk, source sdk base 2006 ve source sdk 2007 araçlarının yine steam klasöründe hazır olması gerekiyor. bunlarla da bitmiyor. tüm yönergelere uymanıza rağmen oyun açılış(siyah) ekranında takılı kalıyorsanız her bir oyun için ayrı ayrı şunları yapmanız gerekiyor;

x:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\half-life 2

adresinde bulunan tüm .vpk ve .cache dosyalarını yine aynı disk üzerindeki steam klasörüne kurduğunuz cm2013 klasörü içindeki şu uzantıya yapıştırıyorsunuz.

x:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\cm2013

http://i.imgur.com/kwNEOEA.jpg?1 

http://i.imgur.com/zGdx2Lz.jpg?1 


episode 1 ve episode 2 oyunları için de benzer şekilde \episodic ve \ep2 klasörleri içinde bulunan bahsini ettiğim dosya uzantılarını cm2013 klasörü altındaki doğru yerlere kopyalayacaksınız. 


aynı şekilde "ya ben bunu kurdum ama karakterler değişmedi" diyorsanız, character pimper programı ile istediğiniz karaktere istediğiniz modeli atamanız mümkün. hatta bu konuda fakefactory üzerinden bulabileceğiniz değişik değişik modeller ile istediğiniz kadar coşmanız mümkün.


x:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\cm2013\character pimper

http://s019.radikal.ru/i605/1208/16/f690b78eff95.png

oyunun bir diğer eksisi çok fazla karanlık olması, brightness ile ne kadar oynarsanız oynayın karanlık bölümlerde bazen ciddi sıkıntı yaşıyorsunuz.

bunlar dışında efsaneye yaraşır bir mod olmuş. efsaneyi onlarca kez bitirenler için vakit ayırmaya değer yeni bir deneyim.

alyx vance'in soğuk esprilerinin yanına bir de şahsi oyuncağı eklenmiş.



son olarak yapımcıya ait web sitesi ve kolayca indirmek için torrent uzantısı;


http://cinematicmod.com/cinematic_mod_2013.php 

http://cinematicmod.com/downloads/torrents/HL2_CinematicMod_2013_final.torrent

Как выражался великий ученый Физико-теоритических наук Гордон Фримен цитирую [........!......,,,,,,....?]

Sok logikai rész, néha perceken át csak gondolkodok, hogy vajon most mit kell csinálni. Nincs a szádba rágva, hogy mikor-mit tegyél, hova menj. Erre is magadtól kell rájönnöd, ami miatt számomra nagyot dob a játék értékén, és élvezhetőségén.
A mai hasonló játékok többségében már egy bazinagy kék nyíl, vagy egy lézercsík mutatja, hogy merre menj, és pontosan, minden lépés le van írva.. Ezekhez nem sok ész kell, csak kapkodni az egeret. Még a story elején tartok, de már most megfogott. Viszont egyszerre nem tudok sokat játszani vele, mert kb. 1 óra játék után megunom. Valószínűleg a túl sok izgalom miatt, hisz eléggé eseménydús a játék eddig.

Jó, ajánlom! Érdemes az Orange Box-ban megvenni.

"69/10 like skyrim with crowbars"-IGN

Half-Life 2 tomando lugar en la ficticia Ciudad 17 varios años despues, Half-Life 2 sigue al científico Gordon Freeman. Gordon se introduce en un entorno poco familiar donde el incidente de Black Mesa es completamente conocido por la sociedad. Freeman es forzado a luchar contra una desfavorable potencia conocido como el imperio Combine, convirtiendose en un miembro de la Resistencia. A lo largo de la historia, Gordon se encuentra con sus viejos amigos, incluyendo científicos y rebeldes, sorprendidos al verlo vivo. pues no era de extrañarse siendo el, el único mortal capas de enfrentarse a todos los enemigos y amenazas que hoy plagan lo que una vez fue la tierra.

En si el juego es una obra maestra lo recomiendo al 100% y bueno te invito a que sigas las aventuras de Gordon Freeman, y recuerda que el Hombre adecuado en el sitio equivocado puede cambiar el rumbo del mundo.

Would you be a fan of smashing hordes of zombies in the face with a [b]crowbar[/b]? 

[i]or[/i]

Dominating an exceedingly large and powerful interdimensional organization known as the Combine? 

[i]or[/i]

Slaying an oversized, rhino-like insect creature and being able to control your very own little army of minions with its own pheromone pod?
____________________________________________

If you answered "yes" to any of these questions above then I would highly recommend that you consider purchasing this game. No? Well then I'm very dissapointed that such things do not interest you. Get it anyway though.

Pros:
[list]
    [*]Story-line progression keeps you on the edge and wanting more.
    [*]Decent variety of weapons to use and wreak havoc upon your foes with, including the beloved crowbar.
    [*]Source engine - enjoy being able to run the game with a low-medium end computer.
    [*]Tests your puzzle-solving abilities, albeit fairly easy.
    [*]Stages are merged together seamlessly.
    [*]Play as the one and only Gordon Freeman.
    [*]Compatible with the Synergy Mod/Obsidian Conflict Mod - allowing you to play this fantastic game with all your friends,        granting for a completely different experience as the enemies become 
stronger in numbers as well as in strength. 
[/list]

Con(s?):
[list]
    [*]Regarding the difficulty, the game could have been a lot more challenging.
[/list]

Overall, this is a wonderful game, it's worth every penny and provides worthwhile entertainment for any first-person-shooter lover out there. 10/10! would crowbar again.

Obsidian Conflict mod link: (Recommended) 
[url=http://obsidianconflict.net/] Click me! [/url]

This game brings me back to the childhood. The Half Life series, by me, has been the most well-made serie I've ever played.

There were just so many moments where I said to myself, "i can't beleive its this good" 

-best controls for signle player fps that I've seen 
-Iimmersive  storytelling, the game never leaves first person view
-beautiful graphics, and its a ten year old game 
-number of weapons and abilities are varied for many different situations
-very little hand holding, the game just let's you figure things out
-best physics engine ive seen in an fps
-its a legnthy and varied experience 

The only gripe is that friendly A.I. can get in the way in later levels

Tartışmasız dünyadaki en iyi FPS oyunu ! Ne kadar o uzun dilli tavan canavarlarından korksam da, bazen korkup oyunu kapatsam da, fizikler, hikaye ve oyunun sizde bıraktığı etki bakımından dünya çapında en iyi 2. FPS oyunu. 1. olan tabii ki de Half-Life 1'dir. Onun yerini alamayacak sanırım :)  Oyunun en önemli özelliği, size herhangi bir talimat vermemesi. Herşeyi kendiniz keşfederek buluyorsunuz. Bu oyunu adam akıllı oynamak ve tüm hikayeyi düzgünce anlamak için İngilizce bilmeniz şart diyebilirim. Ve bu oyunu oynadıktan sonra mutlaka Half-Life 2 : Episode 1 ve Episode 2'yi de edinin derim. Portal serilerini de alabilirsiniz. Half-Life ile bağlantısı olan oyunlar. Half-Life 1'in en azından hikayesiniz okuyun bu oyunu oynamadan önce. Çünkü oyunun en önemli bölümlerinden biri hikayesi. Kesinlikle ve kesinlikle öneriyorum. Counter-Strike gibi oyunlardan hikayesi ve oynanış tekniği ile fark gösteren Half-Life efsanesinin 2. oyununu da mutlaka satın alın ve oynayın. Şimdiden iyi oyunlar diliyorum !
If you have a PC this video game is absolutely essential. So... You must play it, if you want to be part of the Master Race army.
